title: The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch
description: Curious about The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 release date and time? Find out all the information about it from this guide. Titled “Convergence,” the upcoming episode serves as the second season finale. In the previous episode, “The Price,” viewers were shown how Joel and Ellie’s relationship suffered — and how a rift […] The post The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 Release Date, Time, Where to Watch appeared first on ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More.
author: Abdul Azim Naushad
excerpt: Wondering about the release date and time of The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7? Find out all the details and more from this guide.
siteName: ComingSoon.net - Movie Trailers, TV & Streaming News, and More
text: Curious about The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 release date and time? Find out all the information about it from this guide. Titled “Convergence,” the upcoming episode serves as the second season finale. In the previous episode, “The Price,” viewers were shown how Joel and Ellie’s relationship suffered — and how a rift was formed between them, via flashbacks. Here’s all you need to know. When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 release date & time? The episode’s release date is May 25, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT). Check out its release times in the U.S. below: TimezoneRelease DateRelease TimeEastern TimeMay 25, 202509:00 p.m.Pacific TimeMay 25, 202506:00 p.m. Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2 right here. Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 via HBO and HBO Max. HBO and HBO Max are both owned by Warner Bros. Discovery — the former serving as a pay television service and the latter functioning as a subscription-based OTT platform. HBO Max offers subscribers a wide variety of film, television, animation, and documentary content spanning genres and languages. The content provided includes both originals and licensed properties, as well as films and TV shows drawn from the libraries of other networks. What is The Last of Us about? The Last of Us is based on Sony and Naughty Dog’s hugely popular video game franchise. In this season, Ellie goes on a dangerous quest for revenge against Abby after the latter kills Joel. The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows: “Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
html:
Curious about The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 release date and time? Find out all the information about it from this guide. Titled “Convergence,” the upcoming episode serves as the second season finale. In the previous episode, “The Price,” viewers were shown how Joel and Ellie’s relationship suffered — and how a rift was formed between them, via flashbacks.

Here’s all you need to know.

When is The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 release date & time?

The episode’s release date is May 25, 2025, and its release time is 9 p.m. Eastern Time (ET) and 6 p.m. Pacific Time (PT).

Check out its release times in the U.S. below:

Find out how many episodes will be available to watch in The Last of Us Season 2 right here.

Where to watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7

You can watch The Last of Us Season 2 Episode 7 via HBO and HBO Max.

HBO and HBO Max are both owned by Warner Bros. Discovery — the former serving as a pay television service and the latter functioning as a subscription-based OTT platform.

HBO Max offers subscribers a wide variety of film, television, animation, and documentary content spanning genres and languages. The content provided includes both originals and licensed properties, as well as films and TV shows drawn from the libraries of other networks.

What is The Last of Us about?

The Last of Us is based on Sony and Naughty Dog’s hugely popular video game franchise. In this season, Ellie goes on a dangerous quest for revenge against Abby after the latter kills Joel.

The official synopsis for The Last of Us is as follows:

“Twenty years after modern civilization has been destroyed, Joel, a hardened survivor, is hired to smuggle Ellie, a 14-year-old girl, out of an oppressive quarantine zone. What starts as a small job soon becomes a brutal, heartbreaking journey, as they both must traverse the United States and depend on each other for survival.”
